title: NEW LOWER PRICE! T206 HOFer CLARK GRIFFITH PORTRAIT-SC 150-SGC 50 VG/EX 4-A BEAUTY!

posts.post_title: NEW LOWER PRICE! T206 HOFer CLARK GRIFFITH PORTRAIT-SC 150-SGC 50 VG/EX 4-A BEAUTY!
posts.post_content:
For your FINE COLLECTION: A wonderful example of Cincinnati Reds HOFer Clark Griffith Portrait (Sweet Cap 150 w/ Fact 25 VA back).

Perfectly clear focus, super clean F & B, pure white borders, NO blemishes in solid red-orange background. There are NO VISABLE CREASES!

Another sweet card from the Roy Mellinger Collection:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=Ray+Mellinger[/url]

If you want very crisp, very clean & high quality you'll be very pleased to add this one to your HOF collection!

$169 delivered w/ DC. PP Family & Friends, MO or Personal check all are fine!

NEW PRICE $155!

Thanks for looking!
One-time bump for those that may have not seen this very nice card!
